trans-unit.source: The install tool has been locked

For security reasons, the install tool has been locked after a wrong password had been entered more than three times in a row. To unlock it, open the local configuration file and set installCount to 0.
trans-unit.target: Zavoljo varnostnih razlogov je bilo namestitveno orodje zaklenjeno, ker ste trikrat zaored vnesli napačno geslo. Da bi ga odklenili, odprite nastavitveno datoteko in nastavite installCount na 0.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the install tool password. The install tool password is not the same as the Contao back end password.
trans-unit.target: Vnesite geslo namestitvenega orodja. Omenjeno geslo NI enako geslu za vpis v Contao administracijo.

trans-unit.source: To additionally secure the Contao install tool, you can either rename or completely remove the contao/install.php file.
trans-unit.target: Za dodatno zaščito lahko tudi preimenujete ali v celoti odstranite datoteko contao/install.php.

trans-unit.source: This key is used to store encrypted data. Please note that encrypted data can only be decrypted with this key! Therefore note it down and do not change it if there is encrypted data already. Leave empty to generate a random key.
trans-unit.target: Šifrirni ključ bo uporabljen za shranjevanje šifriranih podatkov. Vedite, da so lahko ti podatki nato odšifrirani le s tem ključem! Zato vam svetujemo, da si ga zabeležite in ga ne spreminjate, če imate kako vsebino že šifrirano. Pusite prazno za ustvarjanje poljubnega ključa.

trans-unit.source: Please enter your database connection parameters.
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, vnesite parametre za povezavo s podatkovno bazo.

trans-unit.source: For more information see the MySQL manual.
trans-unit.target: Za več informacij obiščite MySQL priročnik.

trans-unit.source: Please note that the update assistant has only been tested with MySQL and MySQLi drivers. If you are using a different database (e.g. Oracle), you might have to install or update your database manually.
trans-unit.target: Vedite, da je bil pomočnik za posodabljanje preizkušen le z MySQL in MySQLi gonilniki. Če uporabljate drugo podatkovno bazo (npr. Oracle), boste mogoče morali bazo posodobiti ročno. V tem primeru pojdite v system/modules in poiščite vse poddirektorije za config/database.sql datoteke.

trans-unit.source: Here you can import an .sql file from the templates directory with a pre-configured example website. Existing data will be deleted! If you only want to import a theme, please use the theme manager in the Contao back end instead.
If you have imported the example website, the admin's username is k.jones and the password is kevinjones. See the example website (front end) for more information.
trans-unit.target: V kolikor ste uvozili vzorčno spletno stran, se uporabniško ime skrbnika glasi k.jones in geslo kevinjones. Za več informacij si oglejte predstavitveni del (front end) spletne strani.

trans-unit.source: Now please log into the Contao back end and check the system settings. Then visit your website to make sure that Contao is working correctly.
trans-unit.target: Sedaj se, prosimo, vpišite v Contao administracijo (back end) in preverite sistemske nastavitve. Nato obiščite še predstavitveni del (front end) in preverite, da Contao deluje pravilno.

trans-unit.source: Your server does not support file access via PHP; most likely PHP runs as Apache module under a different user. Therefore please enter your FTP login details, so Contao can modify files via FTP (Safe Mode Hack).
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, vnesite podatke za FTP prijavo, da lahko nato Contao spreminja datoteke prek FTP protokola (Safe Mode Hack).

trans-unit.source: Please enter a password to prevent unauthorized access!
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, spremenite privzeto geslo, da se prepreči nepreverjen dostop!

trans-unit.source: A custom password has been set.
An encryption key has to be at least 12 characters long!
trans-unit.target: Šifrirni ključ mora biti dolg vsaj 12 znakov!

trans-unit.source: An encryption key has been created.
trans-unit.target: Šifrirni ključ je bil uspešno ustvarjen.
Povezava s podatkovno bazo je bila uspešna.
Povezovanje s podatkovno bazo je bilo neuspešno.

trans-unit.source: Changing the collation will affect all tables with a tl_ prefix.
trans-unit.target: Spreminjanje kodnega nabora bo vplivalo na vse tabele s predpono tl_.

trans-unit.source: The database is not up to date!
The database is up to date.
It seems that you are upgrading from a Contao version prior to version %s. If that is the case, it is required to run the version %s update to ensure the integrity of your data!
trans-unit.target: Vse kaže, da nadgrajujete s Contao verzije pred verzijo %s. Če je to res, <strong>potem je potrebno zagnati posodobitev verzije %s<strong> za zagotovitev integritete vaših podatkov!

trans-unit.source: The import failed! Is the database structure up to date and is the template file compatible with your Contao version?
trans-unit.target: Uvoz je spodletel! Preverite, da je struktura podatkovne baze osvežena ter da je datoteka s predlogo skladna z vašo različico Contao.

trans-unit.source: Any existing data will be deleted!
Any existing data will be deleted! Do you really want to continue?
trans-unit.target: Vsi obstoječi podatki bodo izbrisani! Res želite nadaljevati?

trans-unit.source: Please fill in all fields to create an admin user!
trans-unit.target: Prosimo, izpolnite vsa polja za ustvarjanje skrbniškega računa!

trans-unit.source: An admin user has been created.
Could not connect to FTP server %s
trans-unit.target: Povezave na FTP strežnik %s ni bilo mogoče vzpostaviti
Ni se bilo mogoče prijaviti kot %s
Ni bilo mogoče najti Contao imenika %s

trans-unit.source: The configured files directory does not exist!

Did you rename the tl_files folder to files? You cannot just rename the folder, because all the file references in the database and your style sheets will still point to the old location. If you want to rename the folder, please do so after the version 3 update and make sure to adjust your database data with the following script: %s.
trans-unit.target: Ali ste preimenovali mapo tl_files v files? Mape ne morete preimenovati kar tako, ker bodo vse reference datotek v bazi in css-ju še vedno kazale na staro lokacijo. Če želite preimenovati mapo, naredite to po posodobitvi na verzijo 3 in poskrbite, da boste prilagodili podatke baze z naslednjo skripto: %s.
